overview: Join us for this exclusive TM video tour - a real-life fantasy of trains, classic cars, and toys - all the result of one man's unlimited passion and enthusiasm. We showcase Dick Kughn s spectacular Standard Gauge Carail layout, the 10x30 'O gauge layout, his train collections plus interviews with Dick and the layout builders - even a tour of Dick s personal Lionel O gauge layout in his home. Prepare to be amazed.
title: Richard Kughn's Train Layouts & Collections
